title: Кто нас нарисовал?
overview: A series of documentaries about the history of Russian animation, dedicated to the 85th anniversary of the Soyuzmultfilm studio. Each of the 15 films tells about the main stages of the development of animation art in our country, about the unique achievements of Russian animation and its influence on world art. Also, an important part of the film will be a description of the historical events against which animated films of different eras were created.
